name: hanu-planner
description: AI-assisted offline timetable planner with local data caching

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run init-db
scripts.init-db: cd backend && node -e "const db = require('./models/Database'); const d = new db(); d.initialize().then(() => { console.log('Database initialized'); process.exit(0); }).catch(console.error);"
